name: Mongoose Systems
tag_list: applicant-tracking, human-resources, knowledge-management, recruitment, talent-management, workforce-management
overview:
Designed for Recruitment Companies, and Corporate HR Departments. The Mongoose Recruitment System allows you to manage Job Orders and Assignments, Candidates, and Clients. The Applicant Tracking System is browser based, which means it can be accessed from anywhere as long as you have an internet connection! As a bespoke system the Mongoose Applicant Tracking System can be tailored to suit your processes.

The Mongoose Recruitment System, is a cost effective Recruitment Software Solution designed by professional recruiters for recruiters. The system has a number of key features:

  • A robust and intuitive professional recruitment software platform
  • Browser based so accessible anywhere with an internet connection
  • Manages Client Relationships, Candidates, Open Vacancies, Advertised responses and customer reports
  • Fully customisable to suit your business requirements
  • Ability to import most data formats from existing systems or to migrate CV’s directly
  • Integrated with LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter
